snippet.title: Naruto SUNS Trilogy/Legacy - PC/PS4/X1 - The Ninja Way Returns (announcement) (english)
snippet.description:
All Storm Games are coming on PS4, XB1 and PC! Enjoy the original storm games with improved graphics with the TRILOGY edition, and the full series in the LEGACY edition! Coming Autumn 2017! Learn more in the trailer below and on our official website: [LINK]

Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Narutogames
Official Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/narutovideogame

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/bandainamcoeu
Follow us: https://twitter.com/Bandainamcoeu
Visit us: https://www.bandainamcoent.eu
